judge and new CNN talkshow host told Metro that he was shocked by the powerful position to which the the Liberal Democrat leader has since risen. Asked who were his most difficult interviewees, Piers Morgan said: Ones who emerge as fairly imbecilic. Nick Clegg stands out; my GQ interview with him was a series of spectacular own goals.`` I thought,' I hope he never ends up running the country' and whoa- here he is. ago SAN FRANCISCO( Reuters)- Chrysler Group LLC's chief executive apologized on Saturday for describing the high-interest bailout loans extended by the U.S. and Canadian governments in 2009 as`` shyster loans.'' Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern, CEO Sergio Marchionne said in a statement.`` I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate.''
